changelog.change: Initial Release. Based on 1.1 version of the original bnet-working version.
Added More visible distinctions between the bnet/steam components.
Fixed an issue with the game process hook that could happen when you launch the game before LiveSplit.
Updated Memory Pointers to remove external reference dependencies and increased precision on load detection [Thanks McCrodi].
Fix to autosplitting incorrectly splitting time on some situations.
